titleStmt.title: A sermon principally entreating of the crosse in Baptisme wherein also it is proued, against the vnaduised reprouers, that it is no popish error, to say; that Austine sent from Gregorie the Great, was the conuerter of the English in this iland: and further that the Britaines did not receiue their first faith from the Church of Rome. By R. H. D.
titleStmt.author: Hacket, Roger, 1559-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by F. K[ingston] for Cuthburt Burbie dwelling in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Swanes,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Swanes
